author: halr9000
body:
- Changing first section to "non-Windows" and clarifying that most of these issues apply to both Linux & OSX.
- Fixed a few typos.
- Adding known issue with Install-Package per #1773

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body: Hi **@halr9000**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. Real humans will now evaluate your PR. TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @halr9000 It's better.  I need to see if #1934 is the right decision, and probably a second reviewer.  Thanks.

title: Clarifying OSX, adding issue with Install-Package
